mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fee(owner_id, amount, type, status, create_time) VALUES(#{ownerId}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE fee SET status = #{status}, pay_time = #{payTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT f.*, o.name as ownerName FROM fee f LEFT JOIN owner o ON f.owner_id = o.id WHERE f.id = #{id}
